help.volume:
Click on the Volume icon to change the volume. When volume control appears, move the volume indicator to the left or to the right.
To close the volume control, click on another part of the screen.
help.microphone:
Check that your microphone is connected correctly.
Click on Section Exit and go to the Overview to read tips on checking your microphone connections.
help.exit: Click on Section Exit to return to the menu.
